name: Super Stario World
description:
*Overview*

Made for a school science project, Super Stario World is a game based on Super Mario World. Play through 4 levels to explore the life of a star! New to this game, enjoy character selection!

*Controls*

Space: Jump

a+d (Or left+right arrows): Walk

Enter: Start Game

* All art assets used are owned by Nintendo, I am making no commercial gain from this project
